nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures Omnibus, Volume 1 is a canon omnibus that collects issues 0–8, 10, 11, Star Wars Adventures Free Comic Book Day 2018 and Star Wars Adventures Annual 2018 of the comic-book series Star Wars Adventures. It was published by IDW Publishing on January 28, 2020.
Join Luke, Leia, Rey, Finn, Han, BB-8, and more favorite characters in this collection of stories ranging from before the events of The Phantom Menace all the way up to The Last Jedi!

Travel to a galaxy far, far away as a rotating cast of characters (and creators!) journey through Star Wars history! Characters major and minor, classic and new, expand the world of Star Wars into new territory, telling larger-than-life stories that encapsulate the breadth of the galactic struggle between good and evil for a new generation of fans.

Rey faces off-world kidnappers in an early adventure on Jakku. FN-2187 turns a bad day and troublesome pest into praise from Captain Phasma. Luke and Leia undertake a high-stakes, two-part undercover mission on Tibrin with explosive results. Plus more stories with K-2SO, Cassian, Emil, CR-8R, and the fight between good and evil!

For fans of all ages and with with a mix of old and new characters, Star Wars Adventures will appeal to Jedi everywhere, Master and Padawan alike! Collects issues #0-8, 10, 11, the 2018 Free Comic Book Day issue, and the 2018 Annual.
